=Core GWT Table classes=
`HTMLTable`, `Grid`, and `FlexTable` are all core GWT classes. Their documentation is [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/documentation/com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HTMLTable.html here]


=Table Modeling=
One of the key features of the incubator table classes is the introduction of a table model in order to support both the bulk loading to table data and the ability to support paging tables.
 
===Class diagram===
http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/wiki-support/images/TableModel.jpg

=ScrollTable=
ScrollTable represents a table with a body, header and optional footer tables. The user choses which table types to use while constructing the ScrollTable. 

ScrollTable used the characteristic interfaces depicted in pink above to determine what functionality the user can enable. 

=Advanced Grids=
The incubator includes many `Grid` based classes.
 
  * General purpose
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/HoverGrid.html HoverGrid] 
  * Primarily used as ScrollTable body
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/FixedWidthGrid.html FixedWidthGrid]
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/SortableFixedWidthGrid.html SortableFixedWidthGrid]
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/GridView.html PagingFixedWidthGrid]
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/EditableGridView.html EditableFixedWidthGrid]

=Advanced !FlexTables=
The incubator includes several tables based on `FlexTable`.
  * Primarily used as ScrollTable Header
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/FixedWidthFlexTable.html FixedWidthFlexTable]
  * BulkLoadingTables
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/index.html?com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/EditableGridView.html BulkLoadedTable]
    * [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/javadoc/index.html?com/google/gwt/widgetideas/table/client/EditableGridView.html PreloadedTable]
